text: The Afghan–Iraqi Freedom Memorial is a war memorial installed on the Oregon Veterans' Building grounds, in Salem, Oregon, United States. The monument was dedicated in 2006. ==See also== * 2006 in art ==References== ==External links== * Category:2006 establishments in Oregon Category:2006 sculptures Category:Afghanistan-Iraq War memorials Category:Fountains in Salem, Oregon Category:Monuments and memorials in Salem, Oregon Category:Outdoor sculptures in Salem, Oregon Category:Sculptures of men in Oregon Category:Statues in Oregon
title: Afghan–Iraqi Freedom Memorial
